Translations.Text: Yasathi ki jara jadugara prabhavi tharale tara amhi tyanceca anusarana karu
Jadugara ye'una phira'aunala mhanu lagale ki jara amhi jinkalo tara amhala kahi baksisa vagaire milela na
(Phira'auna) mhanala, hoya! (Mothya khusine) kimbahuna asa paristhitita tumhi majhe khasa darabari vhala
(Hajarata) musa jadugaranna mhanale, je kaya tumhala takayace ahe, te taka
Tyanni apalya dorya ani kathya khali takalya ani mhanale, phira'aunacya pratistheci sapatha, amhi avasya vijayi ho'u
Ata (hajarata) musa yannihi apali kathi khali takali, jine tyaca ksani tyanca asatyaca banavilela khela gilayala suruvata keli
He pahataca te jadugara sajadyata padale
Ani tyanni spastapane sangitale ki amhi tara sarva visvacya palanakartyavara imana rakhale
Arthata musa ani harunacya palanakartyavara

(Phira'auna) mhanala, majhi paravanagi ghenyapurvica tumhi tyacyavara imana rakhale, niscitaca ha tumaca saradara (motha guru) ahe, jyane tumha sarvanna jadu sikavali ahe. Tevha tumhala attaca mahita padela. Sapatha ahe. Mi dekhila tumace hata paya virud'dha disanni kapuna takina ani tumha sarvanna phasavara latakavina
Te mhanale, kahi harakata nahi, amhi tara apalya palanakartyakade paratuna janaraca ahota
Ya karanastava ki amhi sarvanta prathama imana rakhanare banalo ahota, amhi asa balagato ki amaca svami va palanakarta amacya sarva cuka mapha karila
Ani amhi musavara vahayi (prakasana) keli ki ratricya ratri majhya dasanna ghe'una nigha. Tumha sarvanca pathalaga kela ja'ila
Phira'aunane saharammadhye jama karanaryanna pathavile
Ki niscitaca ha samuha atisaya kami sankhyeta ahe
Ani tyavara he amhala phara krodhita karita aheta
Ani nihsansaya, amhi mothya sankhyeta ahota, tyancyapasuna savadha rahanare
Sevati amhi tyanna bagammadhuna va jharyammadhuna bahera kadhale
Ani khajin'yammadhuna ani cangalya cangalya thikanammadhuna
Asa prakare jhale, ani amhi tya (sarva vastum) ca varasa isra'ilacya santatila banavile
Yastava phira'aunace anuyayi surya ugavataca tyanca pathalaga karanyasa nighale
